documents.document: Not sure if its already been done or not, but I created a playlist for #lca2017 Testing & Automation Miniconf https://t.co/Y9AAllZhbo
Waiting to hear how you are supposed to pronounce â€œPelcgbtenculâ€ at #lca2017. Oh and try refresh any knowledge of cryptography I may have.
@martinkrafft Definitely was some in second to last row at the back on the left side and right side
@martinkrafft Plenary Hall has lots of power boards up towards the back at least
@warkolm has the sun been out for more than an hour at a time? If so it's beating NZs summer...
Wonder if there are any other #lca2017 -ers wandering around Melbourne Airport at the moment...
Trip from Melbourne to #lca2017 in Hobart delayed by 3 hours as plane from Auckland was 10 or so minutes late ðŸ˜•
It's thirsty work getting to #lca2017 but I'm 1/3rd of the way now. https://t.co/LGbcaqEttL
My plane is arriving to take me on my first leg to #lca2017 - excitement is building! https://t.co/3t1YSNck6f
@linuxconfau Is there anything that we need to show when we collect our badges? Couldn't see any mention of it but just thought I'd check
Given all my dreams about missing planes, perhaps I should heed them and start packing for my flight to #lca2017 tomorrow morning... or not.
Dear Adobe - if I wanted a Chrome extension added I'd choose to - don't just install one as part of an *update* - https://t.co/NO1ZnD8hvY
@martinkrafft Ah right - I'm arriving just after 3 on a Sunday so *hopefully* its a bit quieter then...
@martinkrafft Sounds like fun. I'm doing WLG-AKL-MEL-HBA on Sunday - with only a 1 1/4 hour transfer time at MEL should I be worried?
@karleighjjones @FlyAirNZ my thoughts exactly - wonder how many other people aren't aware
@FlyAirNZ Cool - in that case will sign-up the kids so they can help collect some AirPoints for the family! :)
Anyone know if @FlyAirNZ AirPoints still has an annual fee? Searching in T&Cs and fee table it doesn't mention it but doesn't sound right...
And when you answer the phone is less than a minute or so, perhaps that's not a good starting announcement to have...
If @FlyAirNZ are currently experiencing large call volumes and "wait times may be longer than usual" anytime u call is it really not usual?
Now to sit down and play Tetris - aka work out what @linuxconfau talks to attend and how to fit them all in. #toomanygoodtalks #lca2017
@hroethgar you finally managed to get someone to see sense and give you the green light?
Know your storms people! https://t.co/hbUXuYr9V5
@chrisjrn Do you pay them too? ;)
Great scare mongering by @NZStuff again - Headline: "Major quake riskâ€. Actual content: risk of large EQ has increased by only 2%
Flights: âœ…, Accommodation: âœ…, Ticket: âœ…. All set for @linuxconfau 2017!
@linuxconfau Now paid so hopefully its snuck in just in time!
@linuxconfau Bugger don't think I'm going to get the payer of bills to pay in time... oh well, at least I can take a picture of one :)
@georgianelson21 Now isn't the time to take the cattle for a walk! :D
Wow - email query sent to @FlyAirNZ on 18th October. Response finally received 9th November! What's the point of that support option again?
@BakerandTaylor this might be interesting given they aren't technical support specialists but will give it a go...
@BakerandTaylor Kapiti Coast District Libraries here in New Zealand.
@BakerandTaylor hmm that's not my experience. Is there a support page to raise a support ticket to document what I'm seeing?
@BakerandTaylor What is the point of having an ebook reader that won't work if you have no network? Sometimes offline is required...
@clareburgessnz @FlyAirNZ Air NZ social team used to be really responsive. Wonder whatâ€™s happened?
@clareburgessnz @FlyAirNZ :o In this day and age Iâ€™d think 7-10 working *hours* would be target. Non-phone always seems second class citizen
@FlyAirNZ just submitted a contact form on your site and email received says response is endeavoured to be 7-10 business days?! Surely not?
@GAMEdigital Pity - your prices are much better than offered by Steam in NZ! Thanks for the reply though - much appreciated.
@GAMEdigital Are digital downloads purchased via https://t.co/sKS7f4iRdS possible for overseas based customers?
@metlinkwgtn 8 car train full of people + 8 car train full of people + both arriving on adjoining platforms at same time = not so much fun
@wordfence I just received an email saying that the cache functionality is being removed. Any details available about why and when?
Thanks #apidaysnz - great talks & had a great time. Now time to crack open a beer to wind down and try and start sorting through my thoughts
One of the first things to do post #apidaysnz - read up more on JSON-LD
Day 2 of #apidaysnz beginith...
Cool refreshments going down a treat at end of #apidaysnz day 1. https://t.co/66jVpi9C9u
Entering last session of day 1 at #apidaysnz. Tired but filled with ideas. Now to think about where to have dinnerâ€¦ #recommendationswelcome
Listening to Martina Iglesias from Spotify in Stockholm so figured Iâ€™d use the opportunity send out a HI! to @VanessaBrennan1
Also will taunt you when the sun turns to rain half way through the day and the umbrella is at home. â€œWish you hadâ€¦ https://t.co/2a2JEyVsWu
Listening to @DeveloperSteve about Machine Learning errors. Scary seeing that Y2K is still an issue in 2016 #havewenotlearnt #apidaysnz
Spotted whilst at #apidaysnz - this company brought to you by Apple Safari https://t.co/jQRlGyQcm8
I knew Da Vinci invented lots of things but amazed by just how many things!
At MOTAT for first time since #lca2015. Missing the beer :)
@APIdaysNZ I'm looking forward to tomorrow! Wondering if wifi will be available at venue?
@nigel_charman @devopsdaysnz Interesting to see this. Question re no local dev for OpenShift : Doesnâ€™t https://t.co/9mQVnKOJuL fit the bill?
@NZTAWgtn not showing anything on the Traffic Information site?
@hroethgar Must have been this --> https://t.co/3RdHrtjQaz :)
Looking forward to @APIdaysNZ next week. Waiting for one of the talks to convert me from my reluctance to hypermedia :) #apidaysnz
Seems @NZStuff doesn't like making their quizes that hard anymore https://t.co/E5qf5fOVOG
@greaterwgtn Also is there info on what that bus route would look like? (Straight from station to beach or follow 262 route?)
@greaterwgtn With Kapiti bus review, when it says all train services will have Pram Beach bus does it really mean all? (Eg late nights)
@metlinkwgtn just wondering if you have any feedback on my recent feedback re pro-rata tickets and especially impact on Kapiti bus users?
.. @metlinkwgtn Should also point out that it means Kapiti folk lose the free bus for that month as well as not available with 10 trip
Not very happy that @metlinkwgtn getting rid of pro-rata monthlys. If one only starts using train from mid-month, why pay same as all month?
@TechCrunch Have the also given it a makeover to not suck the life out of the battery?
RT @Twitter: "Starting in ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡º on 3/21 and moving across the ðŸŒ, ... Love, Twitter" - We love NZ so much that we forget about them :/
Still 5 minutes to go until the 435 Waikanae train leaves and lots of people standing. @metlinkwgtn #timeforlongertrain
This is one reason that ticketing should not be done by the operator but by @metlinkwgtn in my opinion https://t.co/3d5nT6pkh9
@TranzMetro @metlinkwgtn is this something that is being advertised? If people are buying but dont travel frequently they may get caught out
Please @NZStuff - turn off that horrible Recommended drop down bar that comes up if you scroll even a little upwards and blocks content
@metlinkwgtn Strange decision to no update the online version but thanks for the replies - its appreciated ðŸ‘
@metlinkwgtn Cool - that's what I was referring to. Is plan to update online PDF to the right times? (Understand can't update print version)
@metlinkwgtn Perhaps I have it wrong. Did the times change from x:14 to x:00 or vice versa? (Can't remember what train poster said :) )
When I saw the first photo, first thing that came to mind was "sweat shop". Expected to see sewing machines. https://t.co/L6nTxdyFAc
@metlinkwgtn Saw sign on train saying Xmas NY Eve to Wellington times changed for Kapiti. https://t.co/QHaApjVlHm still shows old ones?
@metlinkwgtn Thanks. Doesn't need to be followed up to that level - I think the t'table might be the problem - too tight for the inbound bus
And yet again the 535 262 bus is not here at the station to meet its departure time... @metlinkwgtn (plenty of other buses parked though!)
I thought @NZTAWgtn had invented a transporter up the road https://t.co/AkLCNhg1sV
Dear @sitepointdotcom - I see that if I join Premium its only $9/month for annual billing ($108). So why is my renewal costing me $120?
Another signal fault in Wellington yard? Wasn't the whole signal system replaced a couple of years back? @TranzMetro
@TranzMetro_HVL @metlinkwgtn I assume that is something to do with the 10 police cars that have gone racing past! :o
9th police car just sped down Waterloo Quay heading north... Something big going down somewhere!
@TranzMetro do you know if the sheep got through a fence or are they allowed to graze next to the line (hope not! :) )
Stuck ontrain due to sheep on the track. I'm pretty sure a sheep would move if you slowly moved a train along the tracks... @TranzMetro
Given Chris Wood's form so far with @LUFC I'm surprised Australia haven't tried claiming him yet ;)
@martinwilson848 Thanks for the reply! Should I expect http://t.co/3WF3RCZKK9 to work as interestingly that doesn't either?
For SSL gurus: If a SSL cert has a CN of mysite*.mydomain.com and I connect to https://t.co/VwfdUNZes6 should one expect a cert error?
Dear @NZStuff, "QV figures show house values rising at fastest rate since 2007" isn't Breaking News you need to push out to phones...
@NZTAWgtn thanks - not too bothered myself but given its one of the main commutes in region it would seem to make sense. Great service tho!
@NZTAWgtn Any reason Paraparaumu not included in regular travel time update?
@jacobbuck it's Lotus Notes. It's not designed to make sense.
@TranzMetro Although would be interested to know how places that have overhead lines and regular snow/ice manage? (Or perhaps they don't?)
@TranzMetro Thanks saw that (although it was a little vague in terms of what delays actually were). Was just being cheeky really :)
@TranzMetro Thanks - great to see you guys monitoring the Twitter account and not just using it for notifications ðŸ‘
@metlinkwgtn can you have speaker system on Paraparaumu platform 1 fixed so you can hear from all parts of platform not just outside office
I really hope this "adverse weather" doesn't last too long... @TranzMetro http://t.co/kq8lMFXaKv
Dear @TranzMetro - "a few minutes" means 3-5 not over 30 minutes! #trainmanagercommunicationttraining @metlinkwgtn
@Jittery @flowdock Does seem a little silly having a status page that doesn't accurately show status for customers
@Jittery @flowdock It is middle of the day over here in NZ!
Looks like over on Facebook @TV3nz are busily deleting perfectly innocent posts to pages. Guess they don't like me mentioning @TVNZondemand
@NortonSupport Would be good to get an indication of months / years / decades / never
@NortonSupport Not good for Asia-Pacificans - having to use what presumably is a substandard product whilst a new one is out rest of world
